ComicInfo.Penciller: Dick Ayers,Mike Zeck,Steve Ditko,Vicatan,Vicatan,Steve Ditko,Dick Ayers,Mike Zeck
ComicInfo.Summary:
Six astronaut scientists return home to "The Day After Doomsday" and decide to repopulate the planet. Their experiments create evolved adult children in less than a year. The evolved men and women abandon their cold-hearted parents, leaving them to their own devices.
An alien energy monster crash lands and tries to find the right material to defend himself against the locals.
Charlie stops a mugging by accidentally killing a man, but stops the wrong mugger.
An astronaut is saved by aliens on Pluto.
ComicInfo.Title: EM the Energy Monster!; Good Deed; Trouble with Air!
ComicInfo.Writer: Bill Kelly,Gerry Conway,Murray Boltinoff,Robin Snyder,Steve Ditko,Sarah Gregory,Bill Kelley,Robin Snyder,Sarah Gregory,Steve Ditko,Bill Kelley,Gerry Conway
